definition[0]: someone who buys goods, property, shares in a company etc, hoping that they will make a large profit when they sell them
definition[1]: someone who buys goods, shares, property, or foreign currency in the hope that their value will increase so that they can be sold again at a higher price in order to make a profit
example[1]: Speculators who bought the options before the bid and sold 24 hours later showed a 100% profit.
